description:
Born in the lab and bred between the tapes. It's not just a lubricant, it cleans your chain while you ride so you spend less time applying and more time riding.

  • Rounded applicator cap effortlessly glides over the chain during application
  • Two-part formula cleans deep inside the chain, expelling moisture, grit, and grime, replacing them with oils and waxes
  • High-speed chain oil for all conditions
  • Suitable for road, MTB and cyclocross bikes
name: Peaty's All Weather Link Lube 60ml
